subject: Track and Field
Rhodes Scholarship
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Haverford College’s powerhouse cross-country team got two major pieces of news on the same day: the team’s best runner won a Rhodes scholarship, and the team won two national titles.
snippet: Haverford College’s powerhouse cross-country team got two major pieces of news on the same day: the team’s best runner won a Rhodes scholarship, and the team won two national titles.
